verses.verse: <S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G4053>advantage<s%> has the <S%G2453>Jew<s%>? <S%G2228>Or<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> is the <S%G5622>benefit<s%> of <S%G4061>circumcision<s%>?
<S%G4183>Great<s%> in <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G5158>respect.<s%> <S%G4413>First<s%> of <S%G4413>all,<s%> that they were <S%G4100>entrusted<s%> with the <S%G3051>oracles<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G5101>What<s%> <S%G1063>then<s%>? <S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> did not <S%G569>believe,<s%> their <S%G570>unbelief<s%> will not <S%G2673>nullify<s%> the <S%G4102>faithfulness<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> will it?

May it <S%G3361>never<s%> be! <S%G1161>Rather,<s%> let <S%G2316>God<s%> be <S%G1096>found<s%> <S%G227>true,<s%> <S%G1161>though<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> [be found] a <S%G5583>liar,<s%> as it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> "That Thou mightest be <S%G1344>justified<s%> in Thy <S%G3056>words,<s%> And mightest <S%G3528>prevail<s%> <S%G1722>when<s%> Thou art <S%G2919>judged.<s%>"

But <S%G1487>if<s%> our <S%G93>unrighteousness<s%> <S%G4921>demonstrates<s%> the <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> shall we <S%G3004>say<s%>? The <S%G2316>God<s%> who <S%G2018>inflicts<s%> <S%G3709>wrath<s%> is not <S%G94>unrighteous,<s%> is He? (I am <S%G3004>speaking<s%> in <S%G444>human<s%> <S%G2596>terms.<s%>)
May it <S%G3361>never<s%> be! For <S%G1893>otherwise<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> will <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2919>judge<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%>?

But <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> my <S%G5582>lie<s%> the <S%G225>truth<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G4052>abounded<s%> to His <S%G1391>glory,<s%> <S%G5101>why<s%> am I <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2089>still<s%> being <S%G2919>judged<s%> as a <S%G268>sinner<s%>?

And why not <S%G3004>[say<s%>] (as we are <S%G987>slanderously<s%> <S%G987>reported<s%> and as <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G5346>affirm<s%> that we say), "Let us <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%> that <S%G18>good<s%> may <S%G2064>come<s%>"? Their <S%G2917>condemnation<s%> is <S%G1738>just.<s%>

<S%G5101>What<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%>? Are we <S%G4284>better<s%> than they? Not at <S%G3843>all;<s%> for we have <S%G4256>already<s%> <S%G4256>charged<s%> that <S%G5037>both<s%> <S%G2453>Jews<s%> and <S%G1672>Greeks<s%> are <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> <S%G266>sin;<s%>
as it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> "There is <S%G3756>none<s%> <S%G1342>righteous,<s%> not <S%G3761>even<s%> <S%G1520>one;<s%>
There is <S%G3756>none<s%> who <S%G4920>understands,<s%> There is <S%G3756>none<s%> who <S%G1567>seeks<s%> for <S%G2316>God;<s%>

<S%G3956>All<s%> have <S%G1578>turned<s%> <S%G1578>aside,<s%> <S%G260>together<s%> they have <S%G889>become<s%> <S%G889>useless;<s%> There is <S%G3756>none<s%> who <S%G4160>does<s%> <S%G5544>good,<s%> There is not <S%G2193>even<s%> <S%G1520>one.<s%> "

"Their <S%G2995>throat<s%> is an <S%G455>open<s%> <S%G5028>grave,<s%> With their <S%G1100>tongues<s%> they keep <S%G1387>deceiving,<s%>" "The <S%G2447>poison<s%> of <S%G785>asps<s%> is <S%G5259>under<s%> their <S%G5491>lips<s%>";
<S%G3739>"Whose<s%> <S%G4750>mouth<s%> is <S%G1073>full<s%> of <S%G685>cursing<s%> and <S%G4088>bitterness<s%>";
"Their <S%G4228>feet<s%> are <S%G3691>swift<s%> to <S%G1632>shed<s%> <S%G129>blood,<s%>
<S%G4938>Destruction<s%> and <S%G5004>misery<s%> are in their <S%G3598>paths,<s%>
And the <S%G3598>path<s%> of <S%G1515>peace<s%> have they not <S%G1097>known.<s%>"
"There is <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G5401>fear<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G561>before<s%> their <S%G3788>eyes.<s%>"

<S%G1161>Now<s%> we <S%G3609>know<s%> that <S%G3745>whatever<s%> the <S%G3551>Law<s%> <S%G3004>says,<s%> it <S%G2980>speaks<s%> to <S%G3588>those<s%> who are <S%G1722>under<s%> the <S%G3551>Law,<s%> that <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G4750>mouth<s%> may be <S%G5420>closed,<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> may <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G5267>accountable<s%> to <S%G2316>God;<s%>

<S%G1360>because<s%> by the <S%G2041>works<s%> of the <S%G3551>Law<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3956><s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%> will be <S%G1344>justified<s%> in His <S%G1799>sight;<s%> for <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G3551>Law<s%> [comes] the <S%G1922>knowledge<s%> of <S%G266>sin.<s%>

But <S%G3570>now<s%> <S%G5565>apart<s%> from the <S%G3551>Law<s%> [the] <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> has been <S%G5319>manifested,<s%> being <S%G3140>witnessed<s%> by the <S%G3551>Law<s%> and the <S%G4396>Prophets,<s%>

<S%G1161>even<s%> [the] <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> in <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> for <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G4100>believe;<s%> for there is <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G1293>distinction;<s%>
for <S%G3956>all<s%> have <S%G264>sinned<s%> and <S%G5302>fall<s%> <S%G5302>short<s%> of the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%>
being <S%G1344>justified<s%> as a <S%G1431>gift<s%> by His <S%G5485>grace<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G629>redemption<s%> which is in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus;<s%>

<S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G4388>displayed<s%> <S%G4388>publicly<s%> as a <S%G2435>propitiation<s%> in His <S%G129>blood<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G4102>faith.<s%> [This was] to <S%G1731>demonstrate<s%> His <S%G1343>righteousness,<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> in the <S%G463>forbearance<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> He <S%G3929>passed<s%> <S%G3929>over<s%> the <S%G265>sins<s%> <S%G4266>previously<s%> <S%G4266>committed;<s%>

for the <S%G1732>demonstration,<s%> [I say,] of His <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> at the <S%G3568>present<s%> <S%G2540>time,<s%> that He might be <S%G1342>just<s%> and the <S%G1344>justifier<s%> of the one who has <S%G4102>faith<s%> in <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

<S%G4226>Where<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> is <S%G2746>boasting<s%>? It is <S%G1576>excluded.<s%> By <S%G4169>what<s%> <S%G4169>kind<s%> of <S%G3551>law<s%>? Of <S%G2041>works<s%>? <S%G3780>No,<s%> but by a <S%G3551>law<s%> of <S%G4102>faith.<s%>
For we <S%G3049>maintain<s%> that a <S%G444>man<s%> is <S%G1344>justified<s%> by <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G5565>apart<s%> from <S%G2041>works<s%> of the <S%G3551>Law.<s%>

<S%G2228>Or<s%> is <S%G2316>God<s%> [the God] of <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G3440>only<s%>? Is He not [the God] of <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%>? <S%G3483>Yes,<s%> of <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%>

<S%G1512>since<s%> <S%G1512>indeed<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> will <S%G1344>justify<s%> the <S%G4061>circumcised<s%> by <S%G4102>faith<s%> and the <S%G203>uncircumcised<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> is <S%G1520>one.<s%>

Do we <S%G3767>then<s%> <S%G2673>nullify<s%> the <S%G3551>Law<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%>? May it <S%G3361>never<s%> be! On the <S%G235>contrary,<s%> we <S%G2476>establish<s%> the <S%G3551>Law.<s%>
